      • changeNetworkSize

        public static boolean changeNetworkSize(int width,
                        int length,
                        int time,
                        int wType,
                        int lType)
        Change the network size. There are total 9 types of changing, based on what direction it needs to adapt. Nodes that are out of network will be deleted. The labels of project will be affected, too. The default type is (wType, lType) = (right, bottom)
        Parameters:
        project - The current working project
        width - The new width of network
        length - The new length of network
        wType - Options for width changing: extend(trim) to left, center or right
        lType - Options for length changing: extend(trin) to top, center or bottom
        Returns:
